    • fromBornBefore

      public java.util.ArrayList<Message> fromBornBefore​(int year) throws java.text.ParseException
      Function to get all the messages sent by users born before the given year
      Parameters:
      year - Year before which the sender must have been born
      Returns:
      list of messages sent by users born before the given year
      Throws:
      java.text.ParseException - as dd-mm-yyyy date format is used and only the year is given, it has to be parsed to Date

    • toBornBefore

      public java.util.ArrayList<Message> toBornBefore​(int year) throws java.text.ParseException
      Function to get all the messages sent to users born before the given year
      Parameters:
      year - Year before which the receiver must have been born
      Returns:
      list of messages sent to users born before the given year
      Throws:
      java.text.ParseException - as dd-mm-yyyy date format is used and only the year is given, it has to be parsed to Date

    • filtrate

      public java.util.ArrayList<Message> filtrate​(java.util.function.Predicate<Message> predicate)
      Function that returns the list of messages according to the given predicate
      Parameters:
      predicate - predicate to filter the messages
      Returns:
      List of messages with less than the given words in the body
